name: The Grim's Dilemma
description:
SGJ 2021 - Theme: Death Begets Life

“You sacrifice the few to save the many.” — Joel Osteen

The Grim Reaper is faced with a tough dilemma. Should he intervene in this final battle to help the loosing side by sacrificing the weakest or should he let history take its course? What are a few lost souls if many others live? Can the survivors live in peace knowing what it cost them? Will help arrive in time to save what's left of the group? Tough choices indeed.

Made by: Filip Slavov & Velislava Chavdarova
Art & Sounds: Phoenix Point made by Snapshot Games
